name: Clever Cowboys Never Ever Bite That Cactus
name_original: Clever Cowboys Never Ever Bite That Cactus
description:
"Clever Cowboys Never Ever Bite That Cactus" is a short read&ride alt.ctrl psychedelic vegan terror experience.

This was our submission for (1) the ALT+CTRL @ HOME 2022 game jam and (2) a famous and labyrinthine indie game festival... 🤞🤞🤞

Mechanics are simple as hell: READ the dialogues and RIDE your chicken while PUSHING all cows to the central cactus. Do it before time runs out and dawn breaks. That's all.

The best way to play "Clever Cowboys Never Ever Bite That Cactus" is making your own REIN-O-MATIC. Don't be afraid, it's super-easy!

  1. Get a piece of string and make a slipknot around each joystick (see photos below).
  2. Fix your gamepad to a plain surface using painter's tape. You can use its plastic blister or a cardboard box for example (see photos below).
  3. If you don't have these materials at hand, ask a friend or familiar to hold the gamepad with their hands instead. Please don't try to hold the gamepad with your feet, knees, tits or testicles (clever cowboys don't do this!!!).
